post.body: I would dm for your tips butyou have to be following me first. Would love your tips!!
Aaron, would love a follow so I can DM you.
it is really cool and really interesting people on there. I hope you are using SOC for your cards.
You should check this out! Cool way to get started on twitter http://twitpwr.com/dz/ Follow some really cool people.
Hey Tim, love the script but do not see my name at the bottom. Any suggestions? Would love to promote this.
How does your jerky biz do?
So funny, that is where I am leaning! Great minds think alike don't they?
Depends on what industry.
You crack me up.
You too. Shouldn't you be out at some party??
Thr grove on a fri night in dec? You should have a glass or 3 of wine first.
Good night!! Have an AWESOME night's sleep.
How does his skin look?
Dude, really looking forward to yours and Mike's event coming up! I loved the video. Give someone an AWESOME day!!
Already on it. Damn it! I wanted to be the 1500th. Great job!
Hey Mike, Really looking froward to you and Perry's deal in Jan. Been part of MS for a couple of years. Thank you, you rock!
Really looking forwardto you and Mike Dillard's event in January. It is gonna be AWESOME!
No worries. I hope it makes people think. Give someone an AWESOME day!
I know this all too well but I love it. I am qute a risk taker in business all for the love of people.
That has got to feel great! I did the same thing yesterday with about the same number. Enjoy the rest of your AWESOME day!
He deserves a gold star or two.
Thanks for the RT! I love it. Give someone an AWESOME day!!
I feel it, Thanks!! Back at you!
Thanks Carlton for the RT. It is a great quote and puts a lot into perspective. Give someone an AWESOME day!
Thanks MAtt for the RT. It is a great quote! Give someone an AWESOME day!
Are going to be at More Heart Than Talent again? You were AWESOME last year!!
Is that the one with Mike Diallard?
Jenn, yes to your answer but I can't dm you unless you are following me. But I am 99% sure she is shipping monday.
Having Rich over and talking strategy tonight. Had a wonderful chat session with Carol and Suzie this afternoon and had an awesome day!
http://twitpwr.com/dz/ is a great way to add followers! Just did it and it took me 10 minutes and am following some really cool tweeps!
Just finished putting the first draft together of a new meetup group. It will be designed for all the folks in network marketing in L.A.
Have a couple of really exciting meetings today! 1 with teammate ready to take on a huge project & the other with leader of a womens group.
Does anyone do a paper newsletter AND an online version? Thinking it might be a good idea to go off line as well.
Hittin the email hard this morning. So much to do before the new year! I am loving being this busy. Give someone an AWESOME day today!
Sitting here laughing because a new friend is gonna see the worst pics of me on FB! I love laughing at myself.
Sitting here with friends getting ready for a massive rain storm in los angeles.
Gr8 quote "The Economic Value of a Network Goes Up Exponentially, NOT numerically." Robert Kiyosaki in Rich Dad's Business School.
Great sales quote. "The more I risk being rejected, the better my chances of being accepted"- Robert Kiyosaki in Rich Dad's Business School.
Checking out @MrTweet, my personal assistant for discovering the great followers and influencers in my network! http://mrtweet.net?c=11!
"The richest people in the world build networks. Everyone else is trained to look for work."- Robert Kiyosaki in Rich Dad's Business School.
